column4: Cisco second-quarter forecast misses on order slowdown
column5: Network equipment maker Cisco Systems Inc's  forecast adjusted profit and revenue growth for the second quarter below analysts' estimates  citing a slowdown in order growth and weakness in its enterprise business outside the United States.

column4: UPDATE 2-Cisco second-quarter forecast misses on order slowdown
column5: * Shares down 5 after market   (Adds CEO  CFO comments  updates shares  details)
